PHYSICAL SCIENCE Multiple Choice Which of the following does NOT represent a chemical

Z) Rust forming on a nail
tossupA: W) WATER FALLING FROM A TAP

NIKOLA TESLA (ACCEPT: TESLA, GEORGE WESTINGHOUSE, or
